metatags.og:description: Help fix the legal industry! The way legal transactions are done is filled with inefficiencies, which leads to ridiculously high legal fees. We're fixing this by building software that automates and streamlines the process. We're profitable and growing sustainably. We're the most popular way for high-growth technology startups to incorporate. Y Combinator and other top accelerators use our software to handle their investment paperwork. Our product is used by tons of top tier startups and investors. We're a quiet leader in the legal technology space - if you are interested in changing the legal industry, this is arguably the best place to be.
metatags.og:title: Clerky - Junior Software Engineer

metatags.og:description: Overview Creative Market is the platform where independent creators around the world buy and sell digital design assets. Our mission is to help creators around the world turn passion into opportunity. As a Brand Designer, you will help make this mission a reality by creating strategic visual work that embodies Creative Market’s brand system, sets our shop owners up for success, and inspires our community. You will collaborate with marketers, designers, community and support managers, and researchers on the entire project lifecycle. You will produce both small tests and larger projects aimed at increasing our MoM growth rate and increasing user acquisition, activation, and retention. Design Team Member As a Junior Brand Designer, you aspire to embody the design team’s mission, vision, and principles. These should be reflected in all aspects of your work. You live & breathe great brand design thinking and visual execution and are passionate about improving our visual design system. You
metatags.og:title: Creative Market - Junior Brand Designer

htmlTitle: The WFC Group - Junior Implementation Consultant (No Experience ...

metatags.og:description: After extensive orientation, training and job shadowing, The WFC Group’s Junior WFM Implementation Consultants will work closely with our clients both domestically and internationally to implement customized workforce management solutions and provide high level functional and technical support both remotely and in person. This position operates mainly in the Kronos Workforce Central or Workforce Ready environments and is responsible for the successful design, configuration, modification, development, and delivery of the application.

metatags.og:description: This position is specifically a remote role. Want more insight on what it's like to be a part of a distributed team at Bitnami? Take a look at this article, written by our Director of Engineering, Victor Tuson Palau. Bitnami is on a mission to bring awesome applications on every platform to everyone. We’re looking for an experienced Senior Engineer to lead development of some of the most exciting open source Kubernetes-related tools being developed today. You will be working alongside developers who, prior to Bitnami, had been building critical infrastructure software at Google, AWS and Canonical, among other companies. You will work on a variety of Kubernetes projects, using Golang and as part of a high-performance distributed team. This includes projects such as: - kubeless - Bitnami’s Kubernetes-native serverless solution (https://github.com/kubeless) - monocular - The application launcher for Helm (https://github.com/helm/monocular/) - ksonnet - The new configuration and de
metatags.og:title: Bitnami - Senior Kubernetes Engineer

metatags.og:description: About Megaport Headquartered in Brisbane, Megaport pioneered the world’s first SDN-based neutral fabric in order to change the way enterprises connect to services. Our vision is to enable services and users to connect over an elastic, SDN based, ubiquitous Ethernet fabric allowing our customers wider coverage, speed to market while reducing costs and enabling real-time provisioning across one platform. The high demand from interconnects and the need for a change in bandwidth acquisition, has pushed Megaport’s global rollout into 25 new markets. The Team We’re looking for talented people to help drive our global expansion to achieve greater reach, across global markets. We’re pioneering exciting areas of networking, including next generation services, elastic bandwidth solutions, cloud services integration, full service delivery automation, total network automation, and Software Defined Network development. Our globally placed team continually strive for innovation, diversity anda cu
metatags.og:title: Megaport - Network Services Specialist

metatags.og:description: Semaphore values mentorship. We provide the autonomy and support you need to achieve your professional goals. In return, we expect that you will ask for help when needed, and contribute your own unique perspective to all our discussions. We’re looking for someone who enjoys contributing to a team, mastering their craft, and embracing their inner nerd.

metatags.og:description: X by 2 is a team of software architecture specialists, bilingual in business and technology, who set the standard for architecture excellence in the insurance and healthcare industries. Careers with X by 2 offer rapid growth, constant learning, and the immediate chance to make an impact. From day one at X by 2, you'll be working side-by-side with our senior architects, contributing to high-impact projects and meeting with our clients face-to-face. It’s a true meritocracy – fueled by a diversity of backgrounds, cultures, and experiences.
metatags.og:title: X by 2 - Junior Software Engineer
